post.description: Account placements and updates. When an account is placed, we will immediately start communications with the account, and will only stop when the account is retracted.
Account retractions - the platform will stop sending communications and close them for all accounts specified through this endpoint.

Account payments - our platform will take this information as information only to judge the success of our platforms. This will lead to better optimization of our communication strategy. This DOES NOT affect the account in any ways - you will still need to send us balance updates separately.

accountNamespace.description: Differentiates accounts across geographic regions or business units

accountRelationship.description: The relationship of the person in this demographic record to the account

accountOpenDate.description: The date the account was originally opened (mm/dd/yy)

brandID.description: An ID representing the brand they want us to represent. This allows us to use different first-party messaging and themes for different brands. We will provide you a set to use.

dateAssigned.description: The date the account was placed with TrueAccord (mm/dd/yy)

expectedRetractionDate.description: The latest date the account will be retracted from TrueAccord. (mm/dd/yy)

transactionDate.description: The date the record was generated (mm/dd/yy)

firstName.description: The first name for this demographic entry

lastName.description: The last name for this demographic entry

middleName.description: The middle name for this demographic entry

prefix.description: The prefix for this demographic entry

suffix.description: The suffix for this demographic entry

email1.description: First email address for this demographic entry

email2.description: Second email address for this demographic entry

email3.description: Third email address for this demographic entry

telephone1.description: First telephone number for this demographic entry (in a 10-digit format e.g. 8666112731)

telephone2.description: Second telephone number for this demographic entry (in a 10-digit format e.g. 8666112731)

telephone3.description: Third telephone number for this demographic entry (in a 10-digit format e.g. 8666112731)

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address for this demographic entry. Include building number and street name. Separate from ‘Street Address 2,’ ‘City,’ ‘State,’and ‘ZIP Code.’

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address for this demographic entry. Include building number and street name. Separate from ‘Street Address 1,’ ‘City,’ ‘State,’and ‘ZIP Code.’

addressLine3.description: The third line of the address for this demographic entry.

addressType.description: The type of address transmitted in this record (ex. HOME, BUSINESS)

city.description: The city for this demographic entry.

state.description: The state code for this demographic entry as two-letter abbreviations (e.g. CA, NY, etc.).

zipcode.description: The ZIP code or Postal Code for this demographic entry. Write the 5-digit ZIP code.

totalAmountDue.description: The total amount that the customer owes on the account (past due + currently due) preferred format 00.00.

currentAmountDue.description: Amount due for this billing cycle. Preferred format 00.00.

currentBalance.description: The current balance on the account. Preferred format 00.00

totalDelinquentAmount.description: The current delinquent amount on the account. Preferred format 00.00

cyclesDelinquent.description: The numbers of cycles that the account is delinquent (number > 0).

lastPaymentAmount.description: The amount of the last customer payment. Preferred format 00.00

lastPaymentDate.description: The date of the last customer payment (mm/dd/yy)

monthToDateFeesPaid.description: Month to Date Fees Paid. Preferred format 00.00

monthToDateInterestPaid.description: Month to Date Interest Paid. Preferred format 00.00

monthToDatePrincipalPaid.description: Month to Date Principal Paid. Preferred format 00.00

placementNumber.description: Number of consecutive cycles that the account has been placed with TrueAccord.

accountNamespace.description: Differentiates accounts across geographic regions or business units

recallReason.description: Reason that the placement is being recalled

recallDate.description: The date that the account is scheduled to be recalled from TrueAccord (mm/dd/yy)

paymentAmount.description: Amount of payment made. Preferred format 00.00

categoryCode.description: Type of transaction (Debit, Payment, Other Credit)
